definition.description: Consideration paid for admission, entry, or access to entertainment, cultural, recreational, sporting or leisure events, attractions, or facilities open to the public.

applies_to: Activities, services, or admissions for which no specific reduced rate is provided in 'Tabella A' or other relevant provisions

All other consideration paid for admission, entry, or access to entertainment, cultural, recreational, sporting, or leisure events, attractions, or facilities open to the public that are not specifically listed in the reduced rate categories

citations.quote: 123) spettacoli teatrali di qualsiasi tipo, compresi opere liriche, balletto, prosa, operetta, commedia musicale, rivista; concerti vocali e strumentali; attivita' circensi e dello spettacolo viaggian

citations.translated_quote: 5) trade shows and fairs; scientific, artistic and industrial exhibitions, film festivals recognized by decree of the Ministry of Finance and other similar events;

citations.translated_quote: The tax rate is set at twenty-two percent (1) of the taxable amount of the transaction. The rate is reduced to four, five and ten percent (2) for transactions involving the goods and services listed,

reduced_rates.name: Reduced VAT rate for admission to circuses and traveling shows
applies_to: costumed and masked parades, wherever held
conditions: The services must be those indicated in Tabella C (now Tabella A, aliquota 10%)

VAT obligations and certification requirements are governed by the relevant provisions, including the issuance of access tickets showing the nature of the activity, date, time, type, price, and other identifying elements
For activities organized in an occasional or sporadic manner, there must be prior notification to the concessionaire as specified by law

For operators of traveling shows and other activities listed in Tabella C who, in the previous calendar year, had a turnover not exceeding fifty million lire, the taxable base is determined as 50% of the total receipts, with total non-deductibility of input VAT, except for certain associations that opt for a different regime

citations.quote: 123) spettacoli teatrali di qualsiasi tipo, compresi opere liriche, balletto, prosa, operetta, commedia musicale, rivista; concerti vocali e strumentali; attivita' circensi e dello spettacolo viaggian

citations.quote: - Le prestazioni   di servizi indicate nella tabella C allegata al presente decreto, incluse   le operazioni ad esse accessorie, salvo quanto stabilito al comma 5,   si considerano effettuate nel mome
citations.translated_quote: - The provision of services indicated in Table C attached to this decree, including related operations, except as provided in paragraph 5, are considered performed at the start of the event... For act

applies_to: mixed cinema and variety shows, in any case and wherever given to the public, even if in clubs and private halls

citations.translated_quote: 1) Cinematographic shows and mixed cinema and variety shows, in any case and wherever given to the public, even if in clubs and private halls;

citations.translated_quote: The tax rate is set at twenty-two percent (1) of the taxable amount of the transaction. The rate is reduced to four, five, and ten percent (2) for transactions involving the goods and services listed,

citations.quote: ## Nota: Tabella introdotta dall'art. 18 del DLG 26/02/99 n. 60.
citations.translated_quote: ## Note: Table introduced by art. 18 of Legislative Decree 26/02/99 no. 60.

citations.quote: ## Nota: Tabella introdotta dall'art. 18 del DLG 26/02/99 n. 60.
citations.translated_quote: ## Note: Table introduced by art. 18 of Legislative Decree 26/02/99 no. 60.

exemptions.name: Institutional associations and organizations exemption
applies_to: Provision of services and supply of goods closely connected thereto, carried out in accordance with the institutional purposes by political, trade union and category associations, religious, welfare, cultural, social promotion and extra-curricular education associations, to members, associates or participants, or to associations carrying out the same activity and forming part of a single local or national organization, as well as to their respective members, associates or participants and to those registered with their respective national organizations
conditions: Payment of specific fees or additional contributions fixed in accordance with the statute, in relation to the greater or different services to which they give entitlement
Provided that such activities do not cause distortion of competition to the detriment of commercial enterprises subject to VAT

citations.quote: le prestazioni di servizi e le cessioni di beni ad esse strettamente connesse, effettuate in conformita' alle finalita' istituzionali da associazioni politiche, sindacali e di categoria, religiose,  …
citations.translated_quote: the provision of services and the supply of goods closely connected thereto, carried out in accordance with the institutional purposes by political, trade union and category associations, religious, …

exemptions.name: Sports associations exemption
applies_to: Services closely connected with the practice of sport or physical education provided by amateur sports associations to persons practicing sport or physical education or to associations carrying out the same activities and forming part of a single local or national organization, as well as to their respective members, associates or participants and to those registered with their respective national organizations
conditions: Provided that such activities do not cause distortion of competition to the detriment of commercial enterprises subject to VAT

citations.quote: le prestazioni di servizi strettamente connesse con la pratica dello sport o dell'educazione fisica rese da associazioni sportive dilettantistiche ... sono esenti dall'imposta sul valore aggiunto, a condizione di non provocare distorsioni della concorrenza a danno delle imprese commerciali soggette all'IVA
citations.translated_quote: the provision of services closely connected with the practice of sport or physical education provided by amateur sports associations ... are exempt from value added tax, provided that such activities do not cause distortion of competition to the detriment of commercial enterprises subject to VAT

exemptions.name: Propaganda events by qualifying entities exemption
applies_to: Supply of goods and provision of services carried out on the occasion of propaganda events by the entities and organizations referred to in number 1) of the relevant provision, organized for their exclusive benefit
conditions: Provided that such activities do not cause distortion of competition to the detriment of commercial enterprises subject to VAT

citations.quote: le cessioni di beni e le prestazioni di servizi effettuate in occasione di manifestazioni propagandistiche dagli enti e dagli organismi di cui al numero 1) del presente comma, organizzate a loro esclusivo profitto, sono esenti dall'imposta sul valore aggiunto, a condizione di non provocare distorsioni della concorrenza a danno delle imprese commerciali soggette all'IVA
citations.translated_quote: the supply of goods and provision of services carried out on the occasion of propaganda events by the entities and organizations referred to in number 1) of the relevant provision, organized for their exclusive benefit, are exempt from value added tax, provided that such activities do not cause distortion of competition to the detriment of commercial enterprises subject to VAT

exemptions.name: Substitute tax regimes exclusion
applies_to: Operations included in substitute tax regimes of the general turnover tax, or also of it, provided for by the laws in force as of 31 December 1972

citations.quote: non sono considerate cessioni di beni o prestazioni di servizi,   agli effetti   dell'imposta  sul  valore  aggiunto,  le  operazioni comprese  in regimi  fiscali sostitutivi dell'imposta generale …
citations.translated_quote: are not considered supplies of goods or services, for the purposes of value added tax, the operations included in substitute tax regimes of the general turnover tax, or also of it, provided for by the

evaluation.reasoning: All populated fields are directly supported by authoritative legal sources, with explicit statutory language and citations. Each treatment (standard, reduced, exemption) is enumerated as required by the task objectives, and no unsupported fields are filled.

jurisdictional_applicability.reason: The cited legal provisions apply at the national (country) level in Italy and govern VAT treatment for amusement/admissions activities.
